top_ghost_periods.first_message_after_ghost: hey can we talk for a bit

top_ghost_periods.last_message_before_ghost: A friend sent this funny video 😂

top_ghost_periods.first_message_after_ghost: hope we can catch up soon

Adam: nicholas - នីកូឡាស់

emotion_analysis.note: Analysis performed on 15,432 messages using the 'emotion-analyzer-v2' model. (Analysis was run on a random sample of 1000 messages to ensure speed).

joy.message: This is the best day ever! I'm so happy!
I am so proud of you! This is wonderful news.
Haha, that's hilarious! You always make me laugh.
I love spending time with you.
Feeling so grateful and happy right now. :)

fear.message: I'm worried this plan might not work out.
Be careful on your way home, the storm looks bad.
That horror movie was genuinely terrifying.
I have a bad feeling about this.
I'm scared of what might happen.

anger.message: I'm so frustrated with this traffic jam.
He had no right to say that. I'm furious.
I can't believe they cancelled our flight. I'm so mad.

disgust.message: Ugh, I stepped in something gross.
I can't watch this, it's vile.
The way he talks about people is repulsive.
Ew, there's a hair in my food.

sadness.message: I'm going to miss you so much.
Feeling really down today. Just one of those days.
I'm so sorry for your loss. My heart is broken for you.
It's a shame that it has to end this way.
I wish things could have been different.

surprise.message: OMG! You're kidding me! I can't believe it!
Whoa, I did not see that coming at all.
No way. You actually did it?

last_message.message: Okay, have a great trip! Talk to you when you get back.

first_message.message: Hey, how was your holiday? Welcome back!

first_message_after_break.message: I'm back! The trip was amazing. How have you been?

last_message.message: Sounds good, let's talk more tomorrow. Good night!

first_message.message: Did you see that new movie trailer? It looks incredible.

first_message_after_break.message: Hey, sorry, yesterday was super busy. What's up?

first_message.message: Happy birthday! Hope you have an amazing day!

first_message_after_break.message: Hey stranger! Long time no talk.

top_messages.message: That's not what I said at all. It feels like you're not even listening to me.
Honestly, whatever. I'm too tired to have this same argument again.
Why do you always have to turn this into a fight? It's ridiculous.
My point is that you're completely missing the issue here. It's unbelievable.
I'm just really upset that you would think that of me. I would never do that.

latest_5_questions.question_text: What do you want to do tomorrow?
Did you see that new movie trailer?
Are we still on for dinner?
Where did you want to go again?
It was good, how was yours?
What time should I be ready?

last_message.message: I'm glad we could talk it all through. I'll cherish the good memories. Goodbye, Adam. Take care!

first_message.message: Hey, is this Eve? This is Adam from the study group.

top_messages.message: I'm feeling really sad about work today. My boss criticized my presentation in front of everyone and I just feel so disappointed in myself. I worked so hard on it.
Having one of those days where everything feels overwhelming. I'm stressed about the project deadline and worried we won't make it. Feeling pretty disappointed with how things are going.
Been feeling really tired lately, like emotionally drained. I think I need to take a break from everything. Just feeling sad and need some space to think.
I'm really frustrated with myself. Made another mistake at work today and I can't shake this feeling of being disappointed. Why do I keep messing up?
Feeling sad watching the news tonight. Sometimes the world just feels too heavy and I get overwhelmed by all the negativity. Need to disconnect for a bit.
I'm so happy and excited! Just got the promotion I've been working towards for months. This is absolutely amazing and I can't wait to celebrate with you tonight!
What an awesome day! The weather is perfect, we had a great breakfast together, and now we're going on that hike we planned. I'm so happy we decided to do this!
Just finished reading that book you recommended and it was absolutely wonderful! Thanks for the suggestion, you always know what I'll enjoy. Feeling so grateful and happy right now.
Had such a fantastic time at the concert last night! The music was incredible and sharing it with you made it even more special. What an excellent evening!
I'm feeling so excited about our vacation plans! Everything is falling into place perfectly. This is going to be such a great trip and I'm happy we're doing it together.

first_ever_icebreaker.message: Hey! I saw your profile and thought you seemed really interesting. Hope you're having a good day!

top_messages.message: You looked absolutely stunning tonight. That dress was so hot on you, couldn't take my eyes off you at dinner.
I love how you make me feel so desired. There's something so sexy about the way you look at me.
The chemistry between us is incredible. I feel such a strong attraction and connection with you.
Can't wait for our romantic getaway next weekend. Looking forward to some intimate time together.
Your smile is so captivating and sexy. I'm drawn to your confidence and passion for life.
Good morning, beautiful. I woke up thinking about you and how lucky I am to have such a precious person in my life. You're my everything, sweetheart.
I love you more than words can express. You make every day feel like a romantic fairy tale. Thank you for being so sweet and caring, my darling.
You're absolutely beautiful inside and out. My heart belongs to you completely. Can't wait to hold you in my arms again, my precious angel.
Every moment with you feels magical and romantic. I love how you make me feel so special and cherished. You have my whole heart, sweetheart.
You're the most beautiful soul I've ever met. I love everything about you - your laugh, your smile, your kind heart. You're my forever love.

sample_messages.message: Hey can we talk about last night?
I was hoping you'd bring it up
I'm really sorry about what I said
It really hurt my feelings
I know and I hate myself for it
Are you still awake?
Yeah what's up?
I can't sleep, keep thinking about us
Me too honestly
What are we doing?
Happy Valentine's Day 💕
Aww you remembered!
Of course I did
You're the sweetest
Only for you
I have something to tell you
What is it?
I got the job!
NO WAY! Congratulations!
Thank you for believing in me
Good morning sunshine
Morning! Did you sleep well?
Better now that I'm talking to you
You're so cheesy 😊
You love it though
I'm scared about tomorrow
Why? What's tomorrow?
The presentation at work
You'll do great, I know it
What if I mess up?
Can I ask you something?
Always
Do you think we're moving too fast?
I don't know, are we?
I just want to make sure you're comfortable
I miss you
I miss you too
When can we see each other again?
This weekend?
Can't wait that long
I had the weirdest dream about you
Oh no, what happened?
We were on a beach somewhere tropical
That sounds nice actually
It was until the giant crabs showed up
Are you still up?
Yeah, can't sleep
Me neither
Want to talk about it?
Just thinking about everything
What are you up to today?
Just relaxing, it's finally the weekend
I know right? This week felt so long
Tell me about it
At least we have two days to recover
I'm at the coffee shop
The one on Main Street?
Yeah, they have a new barista
Is the coffee still good?
Even better somehow
Want to watch a movie together tonight?
Sure! What did you have in mind?
Maybe something funny? I need to laugh
I know just the thing
Perfect, you always know what I need
Look at this cute dog I saw!
Aww, what breed is it?
I think it's a golden retriever puppy
They're the best dogs
Makes me want to get one
Good morning beautiful
Morning! How did you sleep?
Like a baby, you?
Not bad, weird dreams though
Want to tell me about them?
I'm bored, entertain me
Want to play 20 questions?
Sure! You go first
Is it bigger than a breadbox?
You haven't picked something yet!
How was your day?
Long but good, yours?
Same here, work was crazy
At least it's over now
True, and I get to talk to you
Spring is finally here!
I know! The weather is perfect
Want to go for a walk later?
I'd love to
Great! I know the perfect spot
I have something to tell you
What is it?
I got the job!
NO WAY! Congratulations!
Thank you for believing in me
Happy Valentine's Day 💕
Aww you remembered!
Of course I did
You're the sweetest
Only for you
Hey! Are you free this weekend? Was thinking we could go for a hike.
Ooh, that sounds fun! I'm in. Which trail were you thinking of?
Maybe the 'Sunset Peak' one? Heard the views are incredible.
Perfect! Let's do it. What should I bring?
Just the usual - water, snacks. I'll handle the sandwiches. 🥪
Did you watch the latest episode of 'Galaxy Runners'?
Not yet! Don't spoil it! I'm just about to.
Haha, okay, my lips are sealed. 🤐 Just prepare for a major cliffhanger.
You're killing me! Okay, going dark. Talk to you in an hour.
Enjoy the ride! 🚀
Happy Valentine's Day! ❤️
Happy Valentine's Day to you too! You won't believe what I just saw.
What is it? Did the cat learn how to use the coffee machine?
Even better. He's sleeping in the flower bouquet you sent. It's adorable.
No way! Send me a picture right now! 🤣
Okay, pineapple on pizza. Discuss.
It's a culinary masterpiece. Sweet and savory perfection.
You're officially disowned. Fruit does NOT belong on pizza.
Tomato is a fruit. Your argument is invalid. 😉
.... I have been defeated. Well played.
My computer just made a weird noise and now it won't turn on.
Oh no! Did you try turning it off and on again? 😉
Haha, very funny. I think it's serious this time.
Okay, okay. Check the power cable first. Sometimes it just gets loose.
You're a genius! That was it. I owe you one.
Long day. I need a vacation.
Same. Where would we go if we could go anywhere right now?
A quiet beach with a good book and no emails.
I was thinking the exact same thing. Let's make it happen soon.
Deal. It's a promise. 🤝
What do you want for lunch? I'm buying.
Ooh, you're the best! I'm craving tacos.
Taco Tuesday on a Thursday? Bold. I like it. On my way.
My hero! Get extra hot sauce.
You read my mind. 🔥
Did you see those fireworks?!
Yeah, they were amazing! The finale was insane.
Right? Happy 4th!
Happy 4th! Hope you had a great day.
You too! Let's not wait a whole year for the next BBQ.
Just saw a dog riding a skateboard. My life is complete.
NO WAY. PICS OR IT DIDN'T HAPPEN.
I was too slow! He was a four-legged blur. A legend.
I choose to believe you. That's the best thing I've heard all day.
The world is a magical place.
I can't find my keys anywhere.
Are they in the door?
...I am not a smart person.
Happens to the best of us! At least you found them!
Thanks for being my external brain. 😂
